title: sUryakAntattilE
sahitya:
sUryakAntattilE un shuDar mukham kANudammA


anupallavi

  kAriruLai vizhungi un kani naghai poliyudammA


caraNam    ulaginai shuzhaTruginrAi pala pala uDal koNDu kazhaTruginrAi
nalamura uyirgaLellAm inba nATakam naDippavaLE
sUriyanukk-iravu.  no givan rAgA or tALA.  
caraNam 1    sUriyanukk-iravennavennAgum jyOti mun vITTil ennAgum
 caraNam 2    sIriyarai shani bhagavAnum sheyyadu nalgik-kAppAnE
 caraNam 3    sUriya mati mun vidhiyennAm kuLir mati mun minmini ennAm
 caraNam 4    vIriya balamuDan shivayOga veTriyum aruLvAn paramAtmA
